entities.name: WINDOWS COMMERCIAL
entities.description: Products and cloud services related to the Windows operating system, including volume licensing and other commercial offerings.

entities.name: SURFACE
entities.description: Devices and accessories under the Surface brand.

entities.name: XBOX
entities.description: Content and services related to the Xbox platform, including digital transactions, Xbox Game Pass, video games, third-party royalties, cloud services, and advertising.

entities.name: BING ADS
entities.description: Search advertising service excluding traffic acquisition costs.

entities.name: MICROSOFT STORE
entities.description: Physical retail stores of Microsoft, which were closed.

entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Major technology company with diverse segments including Intelligent Cloud, Productivity and Business Processes, and More Personal Computing.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft offers Windows Commercial products and cloud services.
Microsoft produces Surface devices and accessories.
Microsoft manages Xbox content and services.
Microsoft operates Bing Ads for search advertising revenue.
Microsoft closed its physical retail stores, known as Microsoft Store.
